title: Deploy application to Internet Computer mainnet

requirements.summary: Deploy both backend and frontend canisters to Internet Computer mainnet network
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister deploys successfully to mainnet without errors
The frontend canister deploys successfully to mainnet without errors
Both canisters receive valid mainnet canister IDs
The deployment process completes without build or compilation errors
The mainnet frontend URL is accessible and loads without errors

file_operations.description: Verify the actor initialization correctly uses the mainnet canister ID from process.env after deployment. Ensure the createActor function properly connects to the deployed mainnet backend canister.

requirements.summary: Verify mainnet frontend successfully connects to mainnet backend and loads all core application data
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend successfully initializes the actor with the mainnet canister ID
The lessons browser page loads and displays all lessons from the backend
Practice problems load correctly in both practice area and practice mode
Progress tracking page can fetch and display user data
No CORS or network configuration errors appear in the browser console

file_operations.description: Add console logging or error boundary to verify lessons are loading correctly from the mainnet backend. Ensure error messages clearly distinguish between network issues and data fetch failures.
Add verification that practice problems load correctly from the mainnet backend with appropriate error handling for network failures.
Verify topic-filtered practice problems load correctly from mainnet backend using usePracticeProblemsByTopic hook with proper error states.
Ensure the ProgressDashboard receives valid data from the mainnet backend useProgress hook with clear error messaging if data fetch fails.

requirements.summary: Verify Internet Identity authentication works correctly on mainnet deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Users can successfully authenticate using Internet Identity on mainnet
Authenticated sessions persist correctly across page refreshes
The Navigation component correctly displays login/logout states
Authenticated users can mark lessons as complete
Authenticated users can submit practice scores and view their progress
The authentication flow does not produce errors in production

file_operations.description: Verify the AuthClient initialization uses the production Internet Identity URL (https://identity.ic0.app) and that delegation validation works correctly on mainnet. Ensure session persistence across page refreshes functions properly in production.
Verify the authentication dropdown correctly displays login/logout states based on Internet Identity authentication status on mainnet, with proper visual feedback for authenticated users.
Verify authenticated users can successfully mark lessons as complete using useCompleteLesson hook against the mainnet backend, with appropriate success feedback.
Ensure authenticated users can submit practice sessions using useSubmitPracticeSession hook to the mainnet backend, with session data persisting correctly.
Verify authenticated users can view their progress data including completed lessons, streak, achievements, and practice scores loaded from mainnet backend.

requirements.summary: Verify all static assets including generated brainrot-themed images are correctly deployed and accessible from mainnet
acceptanceCriteria: All images in frontend/public/assets/generated are included in the mainnet deployment
Achievement badges render correctly in the ProgressDashboard component
The mascot image displays correctly on the homepage
All image URLs resolve successfully without 404 errors
Images load with appropriate performance and without CORS issues

file_operations.description: Verify achievement badge images load correctly from frontend/public/assets/generated/badge-first-lesson.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/badge-streak.dim_128x128.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/practice-trophy.dim_128x128.png on mainnet with proper error handling for missing assets.
Verify the mascot image at frontend/public/assets/generated/mascot.dim_400x400.png displays correctly in the hero section on mainnet, with fallback handling if the image fails to load.

Verify all achievement badges render correctly with images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory, ensuring the AchievementBadge component receives valid achievement names and images load without 404 errors.
